name: Golf N' Grenades
description:
Golf N' Grenades was made in 47 (not 48 =) hours for Ludum Dare 41 where the theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres" and I decided to combine golf with blowing up/dodging zombies.

Play 9 holes at different levels of difficulty and see how few strikes you can do it in (or if you can in fact even complete all 9 holes without getting tackled by the zombies).
